title: Dude, don’t do that
author: VD
content_html:
Why I’m skipping the Oscars this year
Every year since I was old enough to stay up late, I’ve watched the Academy Awards….

Remember when I wrote that one column? And remember when some people got really mad about an insinuation that someone might not be that interested in the opposite sex? And remember when I didn’t care? And remember, remember when some people thought that was pretty bad but it was actually pretty funny?

That was awesome.
content_text:
Why I’m skipping the Oscars this year
Every year since I was old enough to stay up late,
I’ve watched the Academy Awards
….
Remember when I wrote that one column?  And remember when some people got really mad about an insinuation that someone might not be that interested in the opposite sex?  And remember when I didn’t care?  And remember, remember when some people thought that was pretty bad but it was actually pretty funny?
That was awesome.
